d.f: `一~`種~`食物~。`把~`糯米~`等~`用~`竹葉~`或~`葦~`葉~`包裹~`成~`三角錐~`體~`等~`形狀~，`煮~`熟~`後~`食用~。`民間~`在~`端午節~`有~`吃~`粽子~`的~`習俗~。

francais: gâteau de riz glutineux enveloppé dans des feuilles de bambou
Deutsch: pyramidenförmiger Dumpling aus Reis eingewickelt in einem Blatt
(English: pyramid-shaped dumpling of glutinous rice wrapped in reed leaves)  (S, Ess)
English: glutinous rice and choice of filling wrapped in leaves and boiled
